France. États généraux
France. États généraux. Tiers État
metadata.title: Lettres purpuracées, ou, Lettres consulaires et provinciales, écrites contre les consuls d'Aix et procureurs du pays de Provence.
metadata.creator: Rive, Jean-Joseph, 1730-1791.
Rive, Jean-Joseph, 1730-1791
metadata.publisher: A Dicaiopolis [i.e. Paris?] : Chez Agatton Eleuthere,
metadata.citation: Barbier A.A. Ouvrages anonymes, II, column 1287
metadata.description: By Jean-Joseph Rive. Cf. Barbier, Quérard
Fictitious imprint. Printed in Paris. Cf. Barbier, Quérard. Weller gives Nîmes as place of publication
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, IV:1, 29400

"Appendix a mes lettres purpuracées, etc. aux MM. Debaux, Philibert et Juglar, chargés à Aix de la correspondance avec le Tiers-État de Provence, qui assiste aux États-généraux à Versailles"--P. [93]-117
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained, marked and/or loose pages.
